snippet: A court security officer in Maine has been placed on leave while under investigation for sending a cellphone photo of a defense attorney's notes to a prosecutor....

headline.main: Dying Author Pens Essay With Dating Profile of Husband
headline.print_headline: Dying Author Pens Essay With Dating Profile of Husband

lead_paragraph: A court security officer in Maine has been placed on leave while under investigation for sending a cellphone photo of a defense attorney's notes to a prosecutor.
